verses.verse: Wherefore <WG5105> seeing we<WG2249> also<WG2532> are compassed about<WG4029> with<WG2254> so great<WG5118> a cloud<WG3509> of witnesses,<WG3144> let us lay aside<WG659> every<WG3956> weight,<WG3591> and<WG2532> the sin<WG266> which doth so easily beset<WG2139> us, and<WG2532> let us run<WG5143> with<WG1223> patience<WG5281> the<WG3588> race<WG73> that is set before<WG4295> us,<WG2254>

Looking <WG872> unto<WG1519> Jesus<WG2424> the<WG3588> author<WG747> and<WG2532> finisher<WG5051> of our faith;<WG4102> who<WG3739> for<WG473> the<WG3588> joy<WG5479> that was set before<WG4295> him<WG848> endured<WG5278> the cross,<WG4716> despising<WG2706> the shame,<WG152> and<WG5037> is set down<WG2523> at<WG1722> the right hand<WG1188> of the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> of God.<WG2316>

For <WG1063> consider<WG357> him that endured<WG5278> such<WG5108> contradiction<WG485> of<WG5259> sinners<WG268> against<WG1519> himself,<WG848> lest<WG3363> ye be wearied<WG2577> and faint<WG1590> in your<WG5216> minds.<WG5590>
Ye have not yet<WG3768> resisted<WG478> unto<WG3360> blood,<WG129> striving<WG464> against<WG4314> sin.<WG266>

And <WG2532> ye have forgotten<WG1585> the<WG3588> exhortation<WG3874> which<WG3748> speaketh<WG1256> unto you<WG5213> as<WG5613> unto children,<WG5207> My<WG3450> son,<WG5207> despise<WG3643> not<WG3361> thou the chastening<WG3809> of the Lord,<WG2962> nor<WG3366> faint<WG1590> when thou art rebuked<WG1651> of<WG5259> him: <WG846>
For <WG1063> whom<WG3739> the Lord<WG2962> loveth<WG25> he chasteneth,<WG3811> and<WG1161> scourgeth<WG3146> every<WG3956> son<WG5207> whom<WG3739> he receiveth.<WG3858>

If <WG1487> ye endure<WG5278> chastening,<WG3809> God<WG2316> dealeth<WG4374> with you<WG5213> as<WG5613> with sons;<WG5207> for<WG1063> what<WG5101> son<WG5207> is<WG2076> he whom<WG3739> the father<WG3962> chasteneth<WG3811> not?<WG3756>

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> ye be<WG2075> without<WG5565> chastisement,<WG3809> whereof<WG3739> all<WG3956> are<WG1096> partakers,<WG3353> then<WG686> are<WG2075> ye bastards,<WG3541> and<WG2532> not<WG3756> sons.<WG5207>

Furthermore <WG1534> we have had<WG2192> fathers<WG3962> of our<WG2257> flesh<WG4561> which corrected<WG3810> us, and<WG2532> we gave them reverence:<WG1788> shall we not<WG3756> much<WG4183> rather<WG3123> be in subjection<WG5293> unto the<WG3588> Father<WG3962> of spirits,<WG4151> and<WG2532> live?<WG2198>

For <WG1063> they<WG3588> verily<WG3303> for<WG4314> a few<WG3641> days<WG2250> chastened<WG3811> us after<WG2596> their own<WG848> pleasure;<WG1380> but<WG1161> he<WG3588> for<WG1909> our profit,<WG4851> that we might be partakers<WG3335> of his<WG846> holiness.<WG41>

Now <WG1161> no<WG3956> <WG3756> chastening<WG3809> for<WG4314> the<WG3588> present<WG3918> seemeth<WG1380> to be<WG1511> joyous,<WG5479> but<WG235> grievous:<WG3077> nevertheless<WG1161> afterward<WG5305> it yieldeth<WG591> the peaceable<WG1516> fruit<WG2590> of righteousness<WG1343> unto them which are exercised<WG1128> thereby.<WG1223> <WG846>
Wherefore <WG1352> lift up<WG461> the hands<WG5495> which<WG3588> hang down,<WG3935> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> feeble<WG3886> knees;<WG1119>

And <WG2532> make<WG4160> straight<WG3717> paths<WG5163> for your<WG5216> feet,<WG4228> lest<WG3363> that which is lame<WG5560> be turned out of the way;<WG1624> but<WG1161> let it rather<WG3123> be healed.<WG2390>
Follow <WG1377> peace<WG1515> with<WG3326> all<WG3956> men, and<WG2532> holiness,<WG38> without<WG5565> which<WG3739> no man<WG3762> shall see<WG3700> the<WG3588> Lord: <WG2962>

Looking diligently<WG1983> lest<WG3361> any man<WG5100> fail<WG5302> of<WG575> the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> of God;<WG2316> lest<WG3361> any<WG5100> root<WG4491> of bitterness<WG4088> springing<WG5453> up<WG507> trouble<WG1776> you, and<WG2532> thereby<WG1223> <WG5026> many<WG4183> be defiled;<WG3392>

Lest <WG3361> there be any<WG5100> fornicator,<WG4205> or<WG2228> profane person,<WG952> as<WG5613> Esau,<WG2269> who<WG3739> for<WG473> one<WG3391> morsel of meat<WG1035> sold<WG591> his<WG848> birthright.<WG4415>

For <WG1063> ye know<WG2467> how that<WG3754> afterward,<WG3347> when he would<WG2309> have inherited<WG2816> the<WG3588> blessing,<WG2129> he was rejected:<WG593> for<WG1063> he found<WG2147> no<WG3756> place<WG5117> of repentance,<WG3341> though<WG2539> he sought it carefully<WG1567> <WG846> with<WG3326> tears.<WG1144>

For <WG1063> ye are not<WG3756> come<WG4334> unto the mount<WG3735> that might be touched,<WG5584> and<WG2532> that burned<WG2545> with fire,<WG4442> nor<WG2532> unto blackness,<WG1105> and<WG2532> darkness,<WG4655> and<WG2532> tempest,<WG2366>

And <WG2532> the sound<WG2279> of a trumpet,<WG4536> and<WG2532> the voice<WG5456> of words;<WG4487> which<WG3739> voice they that heard<WG191> entreated<WG3868> that the word<WG3056> should not<WG3361> be spoken to them any more:<WG4369> <WG846>

(For <WG1063> they could not<WG3756> endure<WG5342> that which was commanded,<WG1291> And if so much as<WG2579> a beast<WG2342> touch<WG2345> the<WG3588> mountain,<WG3735> it shall be stoned,<WG3036> or thrust through<WG2700> with a dart: <WG1002>
And <WG2532> so<WG3779> terrible<WG5398> was<WG2258> the<WG3588> sight,<WG5324> that Moses<WG3475> said,<WG2036> I exceedingly fear<WG1510> <WG1630> and<WG2532> quake: )<WG1790>

But <WG235> ye are come unto<WG4334> mount<WG3735> Zion,<WG4622> and<WG2532> unto the city<WG4172> of the living<WG2198> God,<WG2316> the heavenly<WG2032> Jerusalem,<WG2419> and<WG2532> to an innumerable company<WG3461> of angels,<WG32>

To the general assembly<WG3831> and<WG2532> church<WG1577> of the firstborn,<WG4416> which are written<WG583> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> and<WG2532> to God<WG2316> the Judge<WG2923> of all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> to the spirits<WG4151> of just men<WG1342> made perfect,<WG5048>

And <WG2532> to Jesus<WG2424> the mediator<WG3316> of the new<WG3501> covenant,<WG1242> and<WG2532> to the blood<WG129> of sprinkling,<WG4473> that speaketh<WG2980> better things<WG2909> than<WG3844> that of Abel.<WG6>

See <WG991> that ye refuse<WG3868> not<WG3361> him that speaketh.<WG2980> For<WG1063> if<WG1487> they<WG1565> escaped<WG5343> not<WG3756> who refused<WG3868> him that spake<WG5537> on<WG1909> earth,<WG1093> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> shall not we<WG2249> escape, if we turn away from<WG654> him<WG3588> that speaketh from<WG575> heaven: <WG3772>

Whose <WG3739> voice<WG5456> then<WG5119> shook<WG4531> the<WG3588> earth:<WG1093> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> he hath promised,<WG1861> saying,<WG3004> Yet<WG2089> once more<WG530> I<WG1473> shake<WG4579> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> only,<WG3440> but<WG235> also<WG2532> heaven.<WG3772>

And <WG1161> this<WG3588> word, Yet<WG2089> once more,<WG530> signifieth<WG1213> the<WG3588> removing<WG3331> of those things that are shaken,<WG4531> as<WG5613> of things that are made,<WG4160> that<WG2443> those things which cannot be shaken<WG4531> <WG3361> may remain.<WG3306>

Wherefore <WG1352> we receiving<WG3880> a kingdom<WG932> which cannot be moved,<WG761> let us have<WG2192> grace,<WG5485> whereby<WG1223> <WG3739> we may serve<WG3000> God<WG2316> acceptably<WG2102> with<WG3326> reverence<WG127> and<WG2532> godly fear: <WG2124>
For <WG1063> <WG2532> our<WG2257> God<WG2316> is a consuming<WG2654> fire.<WG4442>
